metadata.title: CVE-2022-45939 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: GNU Emacs through 28.2 allows attackers to execute commands via shellmetacharacters in the name of a source-code file, because lib-src/etags.cuses the system C library function in its implementation of the ctagsprogram. For example, a victim may use the "ctags *" command (suggested inthe ctags documentation) in a situation where the current working directoryhas contents that depend on untrusted input.

criterions.comment: emacs package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
xemacs21 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
